amendment.description: Amendment sought to add $3.6 billion to the bill to improve the quality of life for the members of the armed forces in Iraq and Afghanistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert provisions which seek to improve the quality of life for the troops.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 216 (Roll no. 547).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Obey.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
